oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Glimpses of Nashville, Tennessee: Medical Department Vanderbilt University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of the Medical Department of Vanderbilt University, circa 1904. The school was located at 5th Avenue S & Elm Street, Nashville, Tennessee. This building was the site of Vanderbilt's medical department from the time of its split with the University of Nashville in 1895, until it moved to the South Campus in 1911, at which point this building was used as a hospital and clinic. Forms part of Glimpses of Nashville. 1 booklet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vanderbilt University--History--Sources
